title: Z390
author: Z390
content: I want these altcoins by all means, not in a bad way though, I believe they can add more value in my life by 2025, just five altcoins, though i planned for ten projects but I believe these five are the best.1. Moonbeam   ATH: 19$  Possible prediction: 100$2. Elrond            ATH: 540$  Possible Prediction: 1000$ to 2000$3. Near               ATH: 20$    Possible Prediction: 250$4. Solana.           ATH: 260$   Possible Prediction: 1200$5. Mina protocol       ATH: 9$   Possible Prediction: 30$What do you think? Any project you feel is better, minus BTC and ETH is welcome.

comments.author: bayudndy
comments.body: Build a good plan that you can stick to when it comes to a point where you'll be happy with it. I did not research and buy BTC and ETH when they were only as low as $5000 and $90, but make sure you are safe and comfortable with your investment because it is easy to make money in this market. flooded. It's just a matter of how we go about it.

comments.author: Shiru
comments.body: My eyes are firmly fixed on Epidaurus.io - a solar powered, open-source, proof-of-stake cryptocurrency, aiming to be a leader by example as a carbon-conscious enterprise in every aspect of our work - today and moving forward.The IFO is open to no more than 1,800 participants/wallets. Buy in price is a minimum of $200 to a maximum of $800 per person, and eachparticipant will receive an additional 10% EPiD bonus.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on June 25, 2022, 08:54:08 AM(....)What do you think? Any project you feel is better, minus BTC and ETH is welcome. Go for blockchain protocols especially those blockchain networks can be alternative to Ethereum because, as long as Ethereum still doesn't fix the issue about scalability, and the high transaction fees, I believe most the people especially those got low funds that want to participate in Defi/NFT or other smart contracts protocol will find another alternative of Ethereum.

comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on June 25, 2022, 08:54:08 AMI want these altcoins by all means, not in a bad way though, I believe they can add more value in my life by 2025, just five altcoins, though i planned for ten projects but I believe these five are the best.1. I only trust the three altcoins you mentioned to be better and in this case I think Erlond, Near, Solana are very good choices and if I had to add two more to complete the top five I would add Bitcoin and Ethereum to the list me, because those two coins are much better than the thousands of coins that already exist in the market.

But honestly, looking at what you're suggesting here, I think it's more specific in terms of what they're going to produce in the future, rather than giving a price gues

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Most of the projects you included have been making rounds in the crypto market scene, and I think they could be one of the top projects, especially Near. I think they are the ones that can project the cryptocurrency economy with more people on board it. I think it's one to look out to. Of course, this isn't financial advice, lol.Solana has some issues regarding their priorities and lending protocols. I saw that they are in the works of producing smartphones that have the developments of SOL in them or something. I think it could be something, but there are still factors to consider when trying to figure it out.

comments.author: reza7777
comments.body: even from everything you mentioned I don't have it, for the most part portfolio of course in bitcoin after ethereum and binance, the rest are only altcoins that are on the top marketcap. but from the project you mentioned I only believe in solana

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: good luck with those tokens. I hope that what you have predicted may come real soon. The bearish market is still in the crypto and we didn't know when the bearish market will be gone. I just hope that if next years we will see bitcoin will able to recover back again to the 50k or even more. Your are predicting those tokens to be doubled or even more from their ATH and im thinking about some of your tokens may still have a very long journey to make it happen

I've checked the ATH for Mina protocol but it seems that it's not $9 but $6. Still, it has gone low today and just around $0.7. I've got also my own alts to bet for the next bull run and cycle and hopefully they perform very well. But if not, that's okay and the money that I've allocated there as good as gone and that's part of investing.Quote from: Z390 on June 25, 2022, 08:54:08 AMWhat do you think? Any project you feel is better, minus BTC and ETH is welcome. How about Litecoin and Monero?

comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: I have SOL, Avax, and BNB, - I guess they are enough to accompany my Bitcoin and to spread my investment. I don't look for bigger returns or chasing on it but what really matters to me is the assurance that my investment will never fail many years from now. Though I sometimes diversify my portfolio but never I look those coins that you have listed OP and maybe because we have different type of coins and marker view. Trade volume and their market performance are my basis...

comments.author: asyakashi
comments.body: All of your coin choices are great. I really like elrond and Solana. But if I choose which asset I invest more in I will allocate a bit more to Solana. Solana had a great team, avoiding them from the crash that almost happened to Terra LUNA again at Solana, but they were great and I think it's quite appropriate for a future project. But the choice is yours, I'm not a financial advisor.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: If you think those are good, I suggest DCA'ing them since your predictions are running for the 5-year time just so that you can avoid losing everything you've invested all at once or if you want to suddenly stop your investment midway. I honestly wouldn't go for such long-term predictions when it comes to altcoins but up to you. Those are pretty good altcoins considering the list of altcoins out there especially SOL and you can probably add BNB imo. You've split your investments into 5 already so that's good enough imo. Goodluck to you OP.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Most of the project listed by the OP is good except for Solana but for the sake of price discussion, Solana is still a good investment because the number of VC backing on that project is very enormous.I just want to to add Optimism(OP) to the list because they have a promising feature which can solve the scalability issue of Ethereum. There is a lot of L2 project on Ethereum but Optimism has the closest feature that really can help to boost the Ethereum slow network. This project is currently undervalued due to the recent bad event happened but they are slowly recovering and it will be good investment for the future.

comments.author: GatotKaca
comments.body: Quote from: asyakashi on June 25, 2022, 01:40:12 PMAll of your coin choices are great. I really like elrond and Solana. But if I choose which asset I invest more in I will allocate a bit more to Solana. Solana had a great team, avoiding them from the crash that almost happened to Terra LUNA again at Solana, but they were great and I think it's quite appropriate for a future project. But the choice is yours, I'm not a financial advisor.Solana had had a big problem. which resulted in the price experiencing a very large decline like the current price.to buy it now is certainly very cheap compared to the ATH price which was before experiencing a correction this year.but it's better to consider other aspects like the error that the developer already handled a while ago. but not rule out the possibility in the future, that something bad could happen to the development of this asset.so for the OP, it's better to also do some planning for your time in determining profits.

I think those two are better on the list as they also shown a great traction during the bull market and possibly can even get or surpass their previous ATH. Thats what happened on the projects like bnb and eth. I think these listed coins and tokens can be a game changer too and has potential to beat up their previous all time high.

comments.body: I have less interest in Moonbeam because of Moonriver, I don't want to go into details on that, I have other coins that I feel will bring better profits that what you have on your list op but mine are riskier because the projects aren't as popular as yours already.1. Saito2. UFO gaming3. Gala games4. Phala Network5. Gelato Network.

comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on June 25, 2022, 08:54:08 AMI want these altcoins by all means, not in a bad way though, I believe they can add more value in my life by 2025, just five altcoins, though i planned for ten projects but I believe these five are the best.1. Solana.           ATH: 260$   Possible Prediction: 1200$5. Mina protocol       ATH: 9$   Possible Prediction: 30$What do you think? Any project you feel is better, minus BTC and ETH is welcome. You really know how to choose great project bro, all of the above for me considering the fundamentals of this projects and the possibilities they have in future growth. And the most interesting part of it is the market has made it possible to buy these projects at a good entry price.  Like I have said before, this is the time to build a healthy portfolio against next upcoming bull season.  Despite what the media are saying about crypto, history has shown us market always comes back with a much higher force. Do what you think is best but imo this is a great combination. NFA.

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: I have currently a few coins in my portfolio that I trust the most. I just wanted to focus on Ether, Soul and Near. I believe maybe one day my investment will take me to the top. Many people are probably scared of Luna or Terra, I tell them it is just 1 or two coins There are thousands of coins in the crypto market. Moreover, those coins reach high at glance those are the problematic. I have reviewed my portfolio in various ways where I am more secure.
